DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether AL-37807 is safe and effective in treating patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study of AL-37807 to Treat Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Adult patients of either sex and any race with openangle glaucoma or ocular hypertension; logMAR visual acuity not worse than 0.60; additionally clinically relevant ophthalmic or systemic conditions may be excluded Under 18
